text: 5:12 1 Korin 3:1-3; Hibru 6:15:12-13 1 Korin 3:2Ia fomɨra Kraisɨn adarazir otivigha gɨfa, ezɨ kamaghɨn ia gumazamizibar Godɨn akam men sure gamighai. Puvatɨ, ian nɨghnɨziba oteveghavɨra iti, kamaghɨn gumazir igharaziba, Godɨn akar faraghavɨra ian sure gamiziba, me ua ian sure damuam. Ia dagher gavgaviba inian fɨrɨn, ia otem apavɨra iti.
